content:
This is not particulary urgent or relevant, but in Lean3, using lean --make <file> and <file> imports a file that Lean cannot find, the error message is:

Use 'lean --path' to see where lean is looking, or https://leanprover-community.github.io/file-not-found.html for more

As you can guess, the URL is also not too informative. Is this an easter egg?
Although the error message might not be very specific, that url seems to contain at least two ideas and isn't just a 404 page:thinking:
:man_facepalming: I saw File not found and decided that there was nothing interesting on that page!
Damiano Testa has marked this topic as resolved.
